def_en: Your lips are the two outer parts of the edge of your mouth.

def_cn: 唇状物；边缘；（容器等的）嘴
def_en: The lip of something such as a container or a high area of land is its edge.

def_cn: 咬嘴唇（以按下怒气或抑制痛苦等）
def_en: If you bite your lip, you try very hard not to show the anger or distress that you are feeling.

def_cn: 大家都说的；大家都在谈论的
def_en: If you say that something is on everyone's lips, you mean that a lot of people seem to be interested in it and are talking about it.

def_cn: （在想到美好的事物或尝到好东西时）舔嘴唇
def_en: If you lick your lips, you move your tongue across your lips as you think about or taste something pleasant.
If you tell someone that your lips are sealed, you are promising them that you will keep a secret that they have told you.
If you say that someone is keeping a stiff upper lip, you mean that they are not showing any emotion even though it is difficult for them not to.
